df-cht
blocks.content: Define the first Chebyshev function, which adds up the logarithms of all primes less than ` x ` , see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 75. The symbol used to represent this function is sometimes the variant greek letter theta shown here and sometimes the greek letter psi, ψ; however, this notation can also refer to the second Chebyshev function, which adds up the logarithms of prime powers instead, see ~ df-chp . See ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chebyshev_function for a discussion of the two functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: df-vma
blocks.content: Define the von Mangoldt function, which gives the logarithm of the prime at a prime power, and is zero elsewhere, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 32. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: df-chp
blocks.content: Define the second Chebyshev function, which adds up the logarithms of the primes corresponding to the prime powers less than ` x ` , see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 75. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: df-ppi
blocks.content: Define the prime π function, which counts the number of primes less than or equal to ` x ` , see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 8. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: df-mu
blocks.content: Define the Möbius function, which is zero for non-squarefree numbers and is ` -u 1 ` or ` 1 ` for squarefree numbers according as to the number of prime divisors of the number is even or odd, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 24. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: df-sgm
blocks.content: Define the sum of positive divisors function ` ( x sigma n ) ` , which is the sum of the xth powers of the positive integer divisors of n, see definition in [ApostolNT] p. 38. For ` x = 0 ` , ` ( x sigma n ) ` counts the number of divisors of ` n ` , i.e. ` ( 0 sigma n ) ` is _the_ divisor function, see remark in [ApostolNT] p. 38. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csgm, cmpo(s0, s1, cc, cn, csu(s2, crab(s3, cn, wbr(cv(s3), cdvds, cv(s1))), co(cv(s2), ccxp, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-sgm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ œÉ =(s0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ sum(s2 ‚àà { s3 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s3[||]s1 },(s2[^c]s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: efnnfsumcl
blocks.content: Finite sum closure in the log-integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

thm efnnfsumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(ce, c1), cn))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cn), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))))
  fsumcllem(s0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)), cc))
  sstri(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)), cc, cr)
  ssrab2(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))
  ax-resscn()
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wcel(cv(hs2), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))))
  syl2anb(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wcel(cv(hs2), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn)))
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs1), cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ce)
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs2), cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), ce)
  elrabd(hs0, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), cr, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(ce, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)), ce)
  readdcld(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ce, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), cn, co(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(ce, cv(hs2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))), wceq(cfv(ce, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), co(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(ce, cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc))
  recnd(cv(hs1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))))
  simpll(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn)))
  recnd(cv(hs2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))))
  simprl(wa(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn)), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))
  efadd(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  ad2ant2l(wcel(cv(hs1), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn), wcel(cv(hs2), cr), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn), wcel(co(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cmul, cfv(ce, cv(hs2))), cn))
  nnmulcl(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cfv(ce, cv(hs2)))
  elrabd(hs0, c1, cr, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, c1), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(ce, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

  mpbir2an(wcel(nat0, crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wcel(nat0, cr), wcel(nat1, cn))
  0re()
  1nn()
  elrab(hs0, nat0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, nat1, wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  syl6eq(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), nat1, cfv(ce, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), nat0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), nat0, ce)
  ef0()
  simprbi(wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))), wcel(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cn), wcel(csu(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  elrab(hs0, csu(s0, c0, c1), cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn, cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), csu(s0, c0, c1), ce)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ce, cv(hs0))
  diff.ce.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(crab(hs0, cr, wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs0)), cn)))

  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs1)), cn))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(ce, cv(hs2)), cn))
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(ce, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), cn))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(nat0)

  diff.hs0.c(csu(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(ce, csu(s0, c0, c1)), cn))
}

thm efnnfsumcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Fin)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(exp ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, (exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àà ‚Ñï, sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï })
  fsumcllem(s0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, w0)
  a1i(w0, { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï } ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  sstri({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, cc, cr)
  ssrab2(hs0, cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ax-resscn()
  adantl(w0, (hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï } ‚àß hs2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }), (hs1[+]hs2)‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï })
  syl2anb(hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, hs2 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, (hs1[+]hs2)‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï), (hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï))
  elrab(hs0, hs1, cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, (exp ` hs1), hs0 = hs1)
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, ce)
  elrab(hs0, hs2, cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, (exp ` hs2), hs0 = hs2)
  fveq2(hs0, hs2, ce)
  elrabd(hs0, (hs1[+]hs2), cr, ((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)), (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (exp `(hs1[+]hs2))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, (exp `(hs1[+]hs2)), hs0 =(hs1[+]hs2))
  fveq2(hs0, (hs1[+]hs2), ce)
  readdcld(hs1, hs2, ((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)))
  eqeltrd((exp `(hs1[+]hs2)), cn, ((exp ` hs1)[√ó](exp ` hs2)), ((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)))
  syl2anc(((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)), (exp `(hs1[+]hs2))=((exp ` hs1)[√ó](exp ` hs2)), hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recnd(hs1, ((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)))
  simpll(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, (hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï))
  recnd(hs2, ((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)‚àß(hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)))
  simprl((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß(exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï), hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  efadd(hs1, hs2)
  ad2ant2l(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï, hs2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï, ((exp ` hs1)[√ó](exp ` hs2))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  nnmulcl((exp ` hs1), (exp ` hs2))
  elrabd(hs0, c1, cr, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (exp ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, (exp ` c1), hs0 = c1)
  fveq2(hs0, c1, ce)
  a1i(w0, 0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï })
  mpbir2an(0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, 1 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  0re()
  1nn()
  elrab(hs0, nat0, cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, 1 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, nat1, hs0 = 0)
  syl6eq((exp ` hs0), nat1, (exp ` 0), hs0 = 0)
  fveq2(hs0, nat0, ce)
  ef0()
  simprbi(sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï }, (exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àà ‚Ñï, sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)‚àà ‚Ñù)
  elrab(hs0, sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï, (exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  eleq1d((exp ` hs0), cn, (exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1)), hs0 = sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  fveq2(hs0, sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1), ce)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, cr, (exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (exp ` hs0), cn)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ce, hs0)
  diff.ce.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï })
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù |(exp ` hs0)‚àà ‚Ñï })
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w((exp ` hs1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.c(hs2)
  diff.hs0.w((exp ` hs2)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.c((hs1[+]hs2))
  diff.hs0.w((exp `(hs1[+]hs2))‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((exp ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.w(1 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  diff.hs0.c(sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.w((exp ` sum(s0 ‚àà c0, c1))‚àà ‚Ñï)
}

blocks.name: ppisval
blocks.content: The set of primes less than ` A ` expressed using a finite set of integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ppisval(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime)))
} = {
  eqssd(cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), wcel(c0, cr))
  ssrdv(hs0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), wcel(c0, cr))
  ex(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime)))
  elind(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime, wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime))))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, nat2)), wcel(cfv(cfl, c0), cfv(cuz, cv(hs0))))

  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(c1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  elfzuz3(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cfl, c0))

thm prmdvdsfi(setvar s0, class c0) {

  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), cfn), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cfn), wss(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
  fzfi(nat1, c0)

  ax-mp(wss(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), crab(s0, cn, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))), wss(cprime, cn))
  prmssnn()

thm vmaval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cvma, c0), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1))))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, cn, cvma, cif(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1)), csb(hs1, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs1))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), nat1))))
  csbied(hs1, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs1))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), nat1)), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1)), universe, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))), universe))
  rabex(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0)))
  prmex()
  ifbieq1d(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs1))), nat0, cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs1)), nat1), wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1))
  fveqeq2d(chash, cv(hs1), nat1, c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))))))
  fveq2d(clog, cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))))))
  unieqd(cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))))))
  sylan9eqr(cv(hs1), c1, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0)))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6eqr(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))), c1, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rabbidv(s0, cprime, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), cdvds)
  df-vma(hs0, s0, hs1)
  ifex(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1))
  fvex(clog, cuni(c1))
  c0ex()
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(cif(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1)))
  diff.hs1.c(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cif(cfv(clog, cuni(c1)), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, c1), nat1)))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.cprime.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

thm isppw(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wreu(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))))

blocks.content: Two ways to say that ` A ` is a prime power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

thm isppw2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wrex(s0, cprime, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wrex(s0, cprime, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), wreu(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0)))
  isppw(hs0, c0)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cn), wreu(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0)), wrex(s0, cprime, wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, cprime, wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))))
  reu6(hs0, s0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0))
  rexbidva(s0, cprime, wcel(c0, cn), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wrex(s1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), cn), wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), cexp, co(cv(s0), cpc, c0))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))
  mpbiri(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  equid(s0)
  adantll(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  rspcva(hs0, cv(s0), cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cdvds, c0)
  equequ1(hs0, s0, s0)
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), cn), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wral(hs0, cprime, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))))

blocks.name: vmappw
blocks.content: Value of the von Mangoldt function at a prime power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

thm vmappw(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cvma, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cfv(clog, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(cfv(cvma, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cfv(clog, c0), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), nat1)), cfv(clog, cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cvma, co(c0, cexp, c1)), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), nat1))), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn), wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  prmnn(c0)

  eqid(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  iftrued(cfv(clog, cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), nat1))
  eqtrd(cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), nat1, cfv(chash, csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))

  hashsng(c0, cprime)
  fveq2d(clog, cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))
  eqtrd(cuni(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))), c0, cuni(csn(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))
  unieqd(crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))), csn(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))

  abbi1dv(hs0, csn(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))

  prmz(c0)
  iddvdsexp(c0, c1)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)), wcel(c0, cprime), wbr(c0, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, cprime)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c1))
  velsn(hs0, c0)

blocks.name: vmacl
blocks.content: Closure for the von Mangoldt function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm vmacl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr))
} = {
  pm2.61ne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  eleq1(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0, cr)
  imp(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr), wrex(hs0, cprime, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))))))
  isppw2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cprime, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr), wcel(cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), cr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), cr, cfv(clog, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  vmappw(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cfv(clog, cv(hs0)), cr))
  relogcld(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  nnrpd(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  prmnn(cv(hs0))
  eleq1d(cfv(cvma, c0), cr, cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1)), cvma)
  0red(wcel(c0, cn))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cprime)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(cvma, c0), cr))
}

blocks.name: vmaf
blocks.content: Functionality of the von Mangoldt function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm vmaf() {
  |- wf(cvma, cn, cr)
} = {
  mptru(wf(cvma, cn, cr))
  fmpt2d(hs0, hs1, cvma, cn, cr, csb(hs2, crab(hs3, cprime, wbr(cv(hs3), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs2))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), nat1))), universe, wtru)
  a1i(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(csb(hs2, crab(hs3, cprime, wbr(cv(hs3), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs2))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), nat1))), universe))
  csbex(hs2, crab(hs3, cprime, wbr(cv(hs3), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs2))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), nat1)))
  ifex(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs2))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), nat1))
  fvex(clog, cuni(cv(hs2)))
  c0ex()
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cvma, cmpt(hs0, cn, csb(hs2, crab(hs3, cprime, wbr(cv(hs3), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cif(cfv(clog, cuni(cv(hs2))), nat0, wceq(cfv(chash, cv(hs2)), nat1))))))
  df-vma(hs0, hs3, hs2)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cfv(cvma, cv(hs1)), cr))
  vmacl(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(cvma)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.hs3.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
}

blocks.name: efvmacl
blocks.content: The von Mangoldt is closed in the log-integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm efvmacl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn))
} = {
  pm2.61ne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn, nat1, wceq(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0))
  syl6eq(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), nat1, cfv(ce, nat0), wceq(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0))
  fveq2(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0, ce)
  ef0()
  imp(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn))
  syl6bi(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cvma, c0), nat0), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn), wrex(hs0, cprime, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))))))
  isppw2(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cprime, cn, wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1)))), cn))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1)))), cn, cfv(ce, cfv(clog, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  fveq2d(ce, cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), cfv(clog, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)))
  vmappw(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantr(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(cv(hs1), cn), wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(clog, cv(hs0))), cn))
  eqeltrd(cfv(ce, cfv(clog, cv(hs0))), cn, cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  reeflogd(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  nnrpd(cv(hs0), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime))
  prmnn(cv(hs0))
  eleq1d(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn, cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1)))), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2d(ce, cfv(cvma, c0), cfv(cvma, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))), wceq(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1))))
  fveq2(c0, co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(hs1)), cvma)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cprime)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(cfv(ce, cfv(cvma, c0)), cn))
}

blocks.content: The prime count of a squarefree number is at most 1. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2015.)

thm sqfpc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cmu, c0), nat0), wcel(c1, cprime)), wbr(co(c1, cpc, c0), cle, nat1))

  biimpa(wcel(c0, cn), wne(cfv(cmu, c0), nat0), wral(hs0, cprime, wbr(co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0), cle, nat1)))
  issqf(hs0, c0)

  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cpc, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(cprime)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(co(c1, cpc, c0), cle, nat1))
}

blocks.name: muf
blocks.content: The Möbius function is a function into the integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm muf() {
  |- wf(cmu, cn, cz)
} = {
  fmpti(hs0, cmu, cn, cz, cif(nat0, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cprime, wbr(co(cv(hs1), cexp, nat2), cdvds, cv(hs0)))))
  df-mu(hs0, hs1)
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cif(nat0, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cprime, wbr(co(cv(hs1), cexp, nat2), cdvds, cv(hs0)))), cz), wcel(nat0, cz), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), cz))
  0z()
  sylancr(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), cz), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0)))), cn0))
  neg1z()
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0)))), cn0), wcel(crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cfn))
  prmdvdsfi(hs1, cv(hs0))
  hashcl(crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))
  zexpcl(cneg(nat1), cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0)))))
  ifcl(nat0, cz, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs1, cprime, wbr(cv(hs1), cdvds, cv(hs0))))), wrex(hs1, cprime, wbr(co(cv(hs1), cexp, nat2), cdvds, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
}

thm chtfl(class c0) {

  3eqtr4d(cin(co(nat0, cicc, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, cfv(cfl, c0))), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), wcel(c0, cr))

  oveq2d(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, cfv(cfl, c0)), cfv(cfl, c0), wcel(c0, cr))
  flidm(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cin(co(nat0, cicc, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), cin(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, cfv(cfl, c0))), cprime)), wcel(cfv(cfl, c0), cr))
  ppisval(cfv(cfl, c0))
  ppisval(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cr), wceq(cfv(ccht, cfv(cfl, c0)), csu(hs0, cin(co(nat0, cicc, cfv(cfl, c0)), cprime), cfv(clog, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(cfl, c0), cr))
  reflcl(c0)
  chtval(hs0, cfv(cfl, c0))

blocks.content: The Chebyshev function at a non-prime. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: chtdif
blocks.content: The difference of the Chebyshev function at two points sums the logarithms of the primes in an interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: efchtdvds
blocks.content: The exponentiated Chebyshev function forms a divisibility chain between any two points. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm efchtdvds(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0)), cdvds, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1))))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wbr(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0)), cdvds, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1))), wcel(co(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0))), cz))
  nnzd(co(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  eqeltrrd(co(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0))), cn, cfv(ce, co(cfv(ccht, c1), cmin, cfv(ccht, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cfv(ce, co(cfv(ccht, c1), cmin, cfv(ccht, c0))), co(cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c1)), cdiv, cfv(ce, cfv(ccht, c0)))), wcel(cfv(ccht, c1), cc), wcel(cfv(ccht, c0), cc))
  recnd(cfv(ccht, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(cfv(ccht, c1), cr))
  chtcl(c1)
  recnd(cfv(ccht, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(cfv(ccht, c0), cr))

  eqtr3d(co(cfv(ccht, c1), cmin, cfv(ccht, c0)), csu(hs1, cin(co(co(cfv(cfl, c0), caddc, nat1), cfz, cfv(cfl, c1)), cprime), cfv(clog, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccht, cfv(cfl, c1)), cmin, cfv(ccht, cfv(cfl, c0))), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))

  chtfl(c1)

blocks.name: ppifl
blocks.content: The prime-counting function ` ppi ` does not change off the integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: ppip1le
blocks.content: The prime-counting function ` ppi ` cannot locally increase faster than the identity function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: prmorcht

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ mumul . A multiple of a non-squarefree number is non-squarefree. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: mumul
blocks.content: The Möbius function is a multiplicative function. This is one of the primary interests of the Möbius function as an arithmetic function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: sqff1o
blocks.content: There is a bijection from the squarefree divisors of a number ` N ` to the powerset of the prime divisors of ` N ` . Among other things, this implies that a number has ` 2 ^ k ` squarefree divisors where ` k ` is the number of prime divisors, and a squarefree number has ` 2 ^ k ` divisors (because all divisors of a squarefree number are squarefree). The inverse function to ` F ` takes the product of all the primes in some subset of prime divisors of ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm sqff1o(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wf1o(c1, c2, cpw(crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)))))

  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s2, c2, crab(s0, cprime, wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpt(s2, cn, cmpt(s0, cprime, co(cv(s0), cpc, cv(s2)))))

blocks.name: fsumdvdsdiaglem
blocks.content: A "diagonal commutation" of divisor sums analogous to ~ fsum0diag . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumdvdsdiaglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))))))
  elrabd(s1, cv(s0), cn, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))))
  breq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))), wbr(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(cv(s2), cmul, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))
  breqtrd(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(cv(s2), cmul, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))), co(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wbr(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))
  syl112anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wb(wbr(co(cv(s2), cmul, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cmul, cv(s0))), wbr(cv(s2), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s2), cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(cv(s0), cz), wne(cv(s0), nat0))

blocks.content: A "diagonal commutation" of divisor sums analogous to ~ fsum0diag . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)

thm fsumdvdsdiag(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), csu(s2, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), c1)), csu(s2, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), csu(s0, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s2, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), c1, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))), w0)
  ssfid(crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, c0), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  dvdsssfz1(s1, c0)
  ssfid(crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))))
  fzfid(nat1, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))), wss(crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn))
  sseldi(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cn, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))))
  ssrab2(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  dvdsdivcl(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  dvdsssfz1(s1, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))
  impbid(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))))))
  fsumdvdsdiaglem(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0)
  fsumdvdsdiaglem(s2, s1, s0, c0, w0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), cdvds, c0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2))))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s2)))

  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)

  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), cdvds, c0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))
  diff.cn.s(s2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), cdvds, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diff.cdvds.s(s2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, cdiv, cv(s0))
  diff.cdiv.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cdiv, cv(s0))
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)

thm fsumdvdsdiag(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, sum(s2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)}, c1))= sum(s2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, sum(s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s2)}, c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 } ‚àß s2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)}))‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s2, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)}, c1, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s2)}, w0)
  ssfid({ s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, (1[...]c0), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, c0, w0)
  syl(w0, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 } ‚äÜ(1[...]c0), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  dvdsssfz1(s1, c0)
  ssfid({ s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)}, (1[...](c0[√∑]s0)), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }))
  fzfid(nat1, (c0[√∑]s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }))
  syl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }), { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)} ‚äÜ(1[...](c0[√∑]s0)), (c0[√∑]s0)‚àà ‚Ñï)
  sseldi((c0[√∑]s0), cn, { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }))
  ssrab2(s1, cn, s1[||]c0)
  sylan(w0, s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, (c0[√∑]s0)‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 }, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñï)
  dvdsdivcl(s1, c0, s0)
  dvdsssfz1(s1, (c0[√∑]s0))
  impbid(w0, (s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 } ‚àß s2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s0)}), (s2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||]c0 } ‚àß s0 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà ‚Ñï | s1[||](c0[√∑]s2)}))
  fsumdvdsdiaglem(s0, s1, s2, c0, w0)
  fsumdvdsdiaglem(s2, s1, s0, c0, w0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, cn, s1[||]c0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, cdvds, c0)
  diff.crab.s(s0, s1, cn, s1[||](c0[√∑]s2))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, s1, cdvds, (c0[√∑]s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cdvds.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, s2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s1, cn, s1[||]c0)

blocks.name: fsumdvdscom
blocks.content: A double commutation of divisor sums based on ~ fsumdvdsdiag . Note that ` A ` depends on both ` j ` and ` k ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-May-2016.)

blocks.name: dvdsppwf1o
blocks.content: A bijection from the divisors of a prime power to the integers less than the prime count. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2016.)

blocks.name: dvdsflf1o
blocks.content: A bijection from the numbers less than ` N / A ` to the multiples of ` A ` less than ` N ` . Useful for some sum manipulations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)

blocks.name: fsumfldivdiag
blocks.content: The right-hand side of ~ dvdsflsumcom is commutative in the variables, because it can be written as the manifestly symmetric sum over those ` <. m , n >. ` such that ` m x. n <_ A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumfldivdiag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), c1)), csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s1)))), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))))), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))), c1, co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s1)))), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, cfv(cfl, c0), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)))))
  impbid(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s1)))))))
  fsumfldivdiaglem(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  fsumfldivdiaglem(s1, s0, c0, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s1))))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfl.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, cv(s1))
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfl, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfl, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)))
  diff.cfl.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cdiv, cv(s0))
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm fsumfldivdiag(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí sum(s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0)), sum(s1 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0))), c1))= sum(s1 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0)), sum(s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s1))), c1)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0))‚àß s1 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0)))))‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  fsumcom2(s0, s1, (1[...](‚åä ` c0)), (1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0))), c1, (1[...](‚åä ` c0)), (1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s1))), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, (‚åä ` c0), w0)
  fzfid(nat1, (‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0)), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0))))
  impbid(w0, (s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0))‚àß s1 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0)))), (s1 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä ` c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà(1[...](‚åä `(c0[√∑]s1)))))
  fsumfldivdiaglem(s0, s1, c0, w0)
  fsumfldivdiaglem(s1, s0, c0, w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, (‚åä ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cfz, (‚åä `(c0[√∑]s1)))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfl, (c0[√∑]s1))
  diff.cfl.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, s1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, (‚åä ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfl, c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, (‚åä `(c0[√∑]s0)))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfl, (c0[√∑]s0))
  diff.cfl.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cdiv, s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: musum
blocks.content: The sum of the Möbius function over the divisors of ` N ` gives one if ` N = 1 ` , but otherwise always sums to zero. Theorem 2.1 in [ApostolNT] p. 25. This makes the Möbius function useful for inverting divisor sums; see also ~ muinv . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm musum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(csu(s0, crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), cfv(cmu, cv(s0))), cif(nat1, nat0, wceq(c0, nat1)), csu(s0, crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), cfv(cmu, cv(s0))), csu(s0, crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cn))
  sumeq2dv(s0, crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cn))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, cv(s0)))))))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)))), wceq(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))))
  elrab(s1, cv(s0), cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0), wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0))
  neeq1d(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0, cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(s0), cmu)
  breq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), cdvds, c0)
  adantrr(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), nat0), wbr(cv(s0), cdvds, c0), wceq(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, cfv(chash, crab(hs0, cprime, wbr(cv(hs0), cdvds, cv(s0)))))))
  muval2(hs0, cv(s0))
  fsumss(s0, crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))), cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), crab(s1, cn, wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  zcnd(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s1, cn, wa(wne(cfv(cmu, cv(s1)), nat0), wbr(cv(s1), cdvds, c0))))), wcel(cfv(cmu, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(cv(s0), cn))

blocks.name: muinv
blocks.content: The Möbius inversion formula. If ` G ( n ) = sum_ k || n F ( k ) ` for every ` n e. NN ` , then ` F ( n ) = sum_ k || n ` ` mmu ( k ) G ( n / k ) = sum_ k || n mmu ( n / k ) G ( k ) ` , i.e. the Möbius function is the Dirichlet convolution inverse of the constant function ` 1 ` . Theorem 2.9 in [ApostolNT] p. 32. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)

blocks.name: dvdsmulf1o
blocks.content: If ` M ` and ` N ` are two coprime integers, multiplication forms a bijection from the set of pairs ` <. j , k >. ` where ` j || M ` and ` k || N ` , to the set of divisors of ` M x. N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: fsumdvdsmul
blocks.content: Product of two divisor sums. (This is also the main part of the proof that " ` sum_ k || N F ( k ) ` is a multiplicative function if ` F ` is".) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fsumdvdsmul(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c6, cgcd, c7), nat1))
  -| wceq(c0, crab(s3, cn, wbr(cv(s3), cdvds, c6)))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s3, cn, wbr(cv(s3), cdvds, c7)))
  -| wceq(c4, crab(s3, cn, wbr(cv(s3), cdvds, co(c6, cmul, c7))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(co(c1, cmul, c3), c8))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(c5, c8))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsc(s3, c6)
  -| diffsc(s3, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffss(s0, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffss(s2, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  3eqtrd(co(csu(s0, c0, c1), cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3)), csu(s2, c4, c5), csu(s0, c0, co(c1, cmul, csu(s1, c2, c3))), csu(s0, c0, csu(s1, c2, c8)), w0)

}

blocks.name: vmalelog
blocks.content: The von Mangoldt function is less than the natural log. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

thm chtlepsi(class c0) {

  mp1i(wcel(c0, cr), wss(co(nat2, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0)), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(cfl, c0))), wcel(nat2, cfv(cuz, nat1)))

  elin2d(cv(hs0), cprime, co(nat0, cicc, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(co(nat0, cicc, c0), cprime)))

blocks.name: fsumvma
blocks.content: Rewrite a sum over the von Mangoldt function as a sum over prime powers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pclogsum
blocks.content: The logarithmic analogue of ~ pcprod . The sum of the logarithms of the primes dividing ` A ` multiplied by their powers yields the logarithm of ` A ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pclogsum(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(csu(s0, cin(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cprime), co(co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), cmul, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))), cfv(clog, c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {

blocks.name: vmasum

blocks.name: chpval2
blocks.content: Express the second Chebyshev function directly as a sum over the primes less than ` A ` (instead of indirectly through the von Mangoldt function). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: chpchtsum
blocks.content: The second Chebyshev function is the sum of the theta function at arguments quickly approaching zero. (This is usually stated as an infinite sum, but after a certain point, the terms are all zero, and it is easier for us to use an explicit finite sum.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: logfacrlim
blocks.content: Combine the estimates ~ logfacubnd and ~ logfaclbnd , to get ` log ( x ! ) = x log x + O ( x ) ` . Equation 9.2.9 of [Shapiro], p. 329. This is a weak form of the even stronger statement, ` log ( x ! ) = x log x - x + O ( log x ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Apr-2016.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2016.)

blocks.name: logexprlim
blocks.content: The sum ` sum_ n <_ x , log ^ N ( x / n ) ` has the asymptotic expansion ` ( N ! ) x + o ( x ) ` . (More precisely, the omitted term has order ` O ( log ^ N ( x ) / x ) ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2016.)
